Title: Let Me Eat Your Pancreas
Writer: Yoru Sumino (based on the novel by), Tomoko Yoshida (screenplay)
Actors: Minami Hamabe, Takumi Kitamura, Shun Oguri, Keiko Kitagawa
Plot: I am a high school student. I happen to find a diary written by my classmates, Sakura Yamauchi that reveals she is suffering from a pancreatic disease. I spent time with Sakura, but she ...
